name: Rowdy Razy
description:
Another Sunny Land asset adventure!

Control Razy as he runs and jumps his way through a platforming adventure. Heavily inspired by the SNES Donkey Kong Country series, these levels have secret Rubies waiting for you to collect them in special mini-games. Each level also has a Diamond hidden in them, which only the bravest (or foolhardy) of foxes will find.

Controls

  • WASD - Move
  • Space - Jump
  • Esc - Menu

This project is unfinished. Currently there are two completed levels, and my hope is to finish two more and one 'boss' level.  Any feedback would be greatly appreciated, and thank you for taking the time to play Rowdy Razy.
